data.name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Chiptune Style Battle Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Terms of Use

  • - You are free to use the BGM tracks regardless of whether they are free or paid.
  • - You do not need to display any credits.
  • - You may edit the assets.
  • - The original creators will not bear any responsibilities in the event that the usage of the assets results in any claims or damages.


About the Game

This is a collection of chiptune-style BGM perfect for your retro game!


For this collection, we have collected a list of battle scene tunes.
The collection covers a wide range of genres for all types of battle situations, including music suitable for epic boss fights to light-hearted enemy battles.
The tunes utilize NES-style and FM sound sources to recrate game music from the 90’s. However, with sampling sources also mixed in in key points, they go well with BGM materials of different genres without feeling out of place.

Directions:

Simply access the music files stored in the location below and use it freely for your game!
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Pixel Game Maker

Creator: Don

Track List

  • First Battle
  • Shaman
  • Speed Battle
  • Fight Against Former Comrades
  • Fight Against Giant Artifacts
  • Hellfire
  • Fight Against Comical Enemies
  • Guardians
  • Struggle to The Death
  • Immortal Enemies
  • Desert Battle
  • Fight Against the Spirits
